string.name: button_record
string.description: Label for button to record mic [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: button_benchmark
string.description: Label for button to run benchmarks [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: button_decode
string.description: Label for button to decode to speaker [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: benchmark_in_progress
string.description: Shown after user presses benchmark button until the benchmark background process finishes [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

resources.string: Benchmark in progress. See logcat output for progress.

string.name: benchmark_finished
string.description: Shown after background benchmark process completes [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

resources.string: Finished benchmarking. See logcat for results.
